name: Spike 1: Simple Game Loop
description: You need to create the äóìGridWorldäóù game, as described in a simple specification document. The game will demonstrate the use of a simple game loop, separation of update/render code, and game data (both for the world map and players current location).

name: Spike 2: IDE Experience & Comparison
description: There are many IDE tools available and developers need to be able to make informed decisions in order to be productive with the tools they select.

name: Spike 3: Debugger Use
description: Effective use of the debugger is essential for isolating and repairing code errors within a non-trivial project of source code.

name: Spike 4: Advanced Visual Studio
description: There are many features of Visual Studio that can aid developers in developing & debugging their projects.

name: Spike 5: C++11
description: C++11 is a new C++ standard that introduces new features. You need to create a simple C++11 application that explores the new basic features of C++ and how they are beneficial in comparison to the C++03 methods.
